| <style="text-align: left; background-color: #CCCCCC;"> ''' Getting Involved '''
|}

If you want to help contribute to Ubuntu Tanzanian Team then you've come to the right place. Keep reading to learn how.

You have just taken your first step toward getting involved. Before you get started, we ask that you please observe the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/community/conduct|Ubuntu Code of Conduct]]</nowiki>, it's not very long and it will help you get started.

Now that's done. To find out the best way to get started, you should check out our community page at: http://www.ubuntu.com/community/.
